meanings.definition: The state or quality of being divine.
meanings.sent1: The divinity of the sunset filled her heart with peace.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe in the divinity of higher powers.
meanings.sent3: The divinity of chocolate cake is undeniable.
meanings.sent4: The divinity of nature's beauty is a gift to us all.
meanings.sent5: The divinity of love can be felt in every warm embrace.

meanings.sent1: In ancient mythology, Zeus was a powerful divinity.
meanings.sent2: People around the world worship different divinities.
meanings.sent3: The divinity of mischief often led to amusing tales.
meanings.sent4: The divinity of the ocean's vastness is awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The divinity of the stars shines brightly in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: She decided to pursue a degree in divinity.
meanings.sent2: Scholars delve deep into the field of divinity.
meanings.sent3: The divinity of ancient rituals can be quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the divinity of beliefs opens up new perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The divinity of cultural practices varies across different regions.
